Subskills.name: Flaming Pecker
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by phoenix flight.

Subskills.name: Swift Flight
Subskills.description: Increases flight speed of phoenix flight.

Subskills.name: Rise from the Ashes
Subskills.description: At the end of your flight you launch into the air unleashing multiple fire novas beneath you and then land and smash the ground stunning and dealing additional damage to nearby monsters.

Subskills.name: Scorching Fury
Subskills.description: Unleash fireballs in a circle around you when landing.

Subskills.name: Infused Flames
Subskills.description: Gain increased fire skill damage for a short period when crashing into monsters.

Subskills.name: Searing Touch
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash searing chains when flying through monsters.

Subskills.name: Burning Screech
Subskills.description: Increases landing nova area of effect.

Subskills.name: Collateral Burning
Subskills.description: Deal additional fire damage to nearby monsters while phoenix flight is active.

Subskills.name: Burning Wings
Subskills.description: Flight distance is now short. Upon landing you knock back all monsters around scorching the land below them dealing fire damage and stunning them.

Subskills.name: Afterburn
Subskills.description: Chance on landing to unleash an additional nova.

Subskills.name: Molten Feathers
Subskills.description: Increases damage reduction while phoenix flight is active.

Subskills.name: Seed of Fulmination
Subskills.description: Plant a seed of fulmination on monsters you fly through that explodes after a short delay.

Subskills.name: Wings of the Phoenix
Subskills.description: When flying you rapidly shoot searing bolts behind you in a cone.
